评论详情: My wife loves them so much I ordered her a pair of the high tops as well
Very comfortable

评论概述: Great so far… I’ll be back after Disney
评论详情: I started researching barefoot shoes shortly after realizing the Hokas I purchased have done nothing but intensify the chronic pain that I thought they’d help eliminate. I found these on a list of more cost effective options, and they’re relatively cute and neutral. The toe box is very wide but really not that noticeable; however, I wear a smaller/average size, so it’s possible that it would be more pronounced in larger sized shoes (which I know bothers some people). I’ve walked a couple miles in them and have been truly impressed with the comfort and noticeable decrease in chronic pain I typically experience. I plan on updating after my upcoming Disney trip which is arguably the most intensive test I can put them through.
I bought a tan pair that I use for weight lifting and I love them! I bought a black pair for my mom and they are easily her favorite shoe. They are super comfortable.

These shoes were a wise purchase. I would recommend them for anyone wanting to try out barefoot shoes, but not spend a lot of money. I have a lot of biomechanical issues, and I wanted to see if wearing barefoot shoes might help. Immediately, they were comfortable on my feet and felt natural. My knees, back, and ankle already feel better wearing them. I am transitioning slowly, but have gone for a half mile walk with no problems. They do work muscles differently, but that's to be expected. I wear a 9 1/2 in most athletic shoes. These don't come in half sizes, so I went up to a size 10, and I'm glad I did. I have a thumb's width of length at the end of my longest foot, which is what I prefer. From what I have read, it's preferable to give your feet extra room in this type of shoe. I will definitely be buying more of these in different colors.
I’ve worn these daily since I got them. They are so comfy and great!

评论概述: Finally a ACTUALLY wide toed comfy shoe !!
评论详情: I’m having some issues with my toes and although I wear sneakers every day for work, I could never find a pair that had a wide enough toe box 2 accommodate the spacers I have between my toes. I’ve had great luck with these shoes! I can wear my orthotics, toe, spacers, and socks, all well continuing to work in my house cleaner business! Yay ! Highly recommended.. well made also ! My orthotic. Is the purple thing inside the shoe

This is my 2nd pair of these amazing shoes. My toes are so happy. The first pair lasted so long and were so comfortable I worried about replacing them, but I swear there is even more padding and comfort in my new pair. Can’t wait to get another color! 💛
Like clown shoes.
Bought product to be new and not used . Got the product and the soles were 100% used and had dirt on them and grass stains on the sides and soles . Ended up returning the product .
It’s comfortable, wearable, perfect size, and more room for toes. I would definitely order another pair later on.
I like them and since I’m normally a size 9, that’s what I bought. However I probably should’ve gone to an 8 1/2. They seem to run larger in size.
The fit is great but the roominess of the toe area allows me to stretch out and wiggle my toes freely.  The soles are also comfortable.  I ordered other colors too.
Love these. They are so comfortable. Feels like you’re wearing nothing. I’ll be buying other colors.
Love these shoes....  very comfortable!!!

They are so comfortable if you like zero drop, barefoot shoes. Wide enough toe box that they don't pinch or rub anywhere. These are a quarter of the price of my other barefoot sneakers, will defiantly buy more

Hello. These are my FAV shoes by a mile ! They are Zero Drop shoes. They are durable for countless miles on any surface. They grip the road &/ trail securely. When they get wet, They dry quickly overnight. They provide sufficient support, Yet are flexible. The shoe runs true to size. They have a wide toe box. There are many appealing colours to choose from. Excellent value for the money.  Thank you,Whitin,for creating this all-purpose shoe !  Thank you,Whitin,for a cr
No tengo imágenes, pero debo decir que son como están en la foto, llegaron perfectos y se sientes super cómodos para un domingo poder hacer tus cosas y salir a caminar relajada..
It took a little to get comfortable with the barefoot style shoe but these are excellent, fashionable, and very comfortable! They fit true to size.

I was searching for a comfortable pair of shoes to wear at home.  I’ve been wearing these everywhere I go including my exercise of walking at the mall. They are attractive and seem to be a good value for the money.

I have narrow, overpronated feet. The laces and tightening of these shoes are good. The laces hold well and the shoot feels snug to the foot. The inside heel around the shoe is padded for a nice fit as well. I think the material is a nice thick material - we will see how it holds up to washes. I wear a 7.5 to an 8, I chose an 8 due to having narrow feet. The creasing when you tighten at the top is a little bit frustrating but not a deal breaker. I think it's a decent shoe for $40. My only thing, the insole of the shoes is REALLY pretty thin/not that squishy. I don't think it'll provide much heel comfort in the long run - you'll likely have to buy more insoles. These are not waterproof.  Update, two days in - they will start to hurt your feet pretty quickly. A bit of a let down
I'm so glad I found these. I hate wearing shoes that pinch my toes so with this wider toe box and shorter heel I'm sooooo much more comfortable walking and standing for long periods.

These are my go-to casual shoes. They are cute and go with so many outfits and they're super comfy! I might get more colors. These are great quality for the price. I will warn you that they don't provide support or protection. They're pretty much like thick socks but with a sole.

I’ve been wearing Xero shoes for years now but was looking to try something new. These are better in my opinion. I’ve only worn them for a day so I can’t yet vouch for the quality/durability…. But the comfort is 10/10, especially for a barefoot shoe. PLENTY of room for my extremely wide toe spread
I was so badly wanting to love these but unfortunately they rubbed my pinky toe just the right way to cause sores.. I had to return…
Great fit. 9 wide. Very confortable. Would purchase again. Have purchased several Whitin shoes.

The good first So very comfortable sizing is exact the construction spot on This is the first wide toe shoe I've ever purchased and happy with finally a shoe that can be walked in all day in complete comfort Maybe just me but when I look down at them to me they look like big clown shoes so it's either vanity or comfort.

They fit well and are comfortable. However they were sent already dirty. Seems like they might have used rusted parts or they sat and rusted, I’m unsure. Overall not bad, but maybe don’t buy a light pair!

I received these on 10/26/24. It's 12/26/24. They are falling apart. I tried to contact 'customer service' but their website information is not valid and they cannot be contacted 🙃 hopefully they see this and resolve the issue.
These shoes are so light and comfortable. Nice casual shoes. Perfect fit, true to size. I’m not big on tennis shoes but I love these!
Every nice
My feet want space! These shoes give them space! Perfect casual shoe for those who like their shoes to be spacious and light.

An orthopedic surgeon I used to work with recommends these shoes- primarily for the wide toe box. I often struggle with this. These shoes are very comfortable. Maybe not awesome if you are on your feet all day, but to throw on for around town or around the house they are great. My husband thinks they are cute which is a plus.

评论概述: Replacing after 2 years after daily use!
评论详情: Y’all these shoes are LEGIT. I bought these two years ago and I wear them pretty much every single day without fail and I’m just now replacing them. I got the beige and I will say they do get dirty but I hand washed them (scrubbed with a brush and dish detergent lol) and they do come clean again. I did replace the insoles but that was by choice not necessity. I love love love these shoes and will continue replacing them every few years. Also, I’m not sure if this is a coincidence or not but I was having severe knee pain to the point of needing physical therapy not long after getting these (the pain was happening before I bought them) and now I have zero pain. I really believe that these barefoot shoes in combo of physical therapy has helped heal my knee and keep it healthy. I won’t ever go back to wearing traditional sneakers. If you’re on the fence BUY THEM.  Also I got no kind of incentive for writing this, I just wrote it because I went to to repurchase them and realized I hadn’t.
My Mom was wearing crocs but due to the fall risk,  we found these online and she really likes them.

I made the mistake of buying white shoes.  I had them two weeks and needed to clean them.  I didn’t dry them but they have come apart - very disappointing.  They are cute and comfortable but not worth it if you can’t wash them.
Comfy
Love these shoes. Cute. Comfortable and easy to wear
I like these because they are not as wide as some of the barefoot shoes, so I don't look like I'm wearing clown shoes. I can wear them to work or to the grocery store. Good, comfortable casual shoes.

I tried so many shoes, so many promises, but nothing worked for my flat feet and tendonitis. i became crest fallen. This was my last try, almost! I even wear the black shoes to work. It's so comfortable. Love it! Thank you!!
i have bought the canvas shoes which i love too. but these are way more comfortable and have more cushion. i will buy more

I have been putting off trying these due to heel spurs. Should have tried them sooner. I can walk all day and my feet don’t hurt. I don’t know how they work, but they do! If you’re on the fence, jump off and get some!
Super comfy for a minimal shoe.  First day wearing them for so many compliments.
Our family loves our Whitin shoes. They have shoes for every occasion and every member of the family. They are comfortable, breathable, and durable.

I have wide feet and now a size 11.5 after having a child. Finding shoes to fit has always been difficult, then with the closing of Payless, impossible. These shoes are great. I have flat feet and plantar fasciitis. I have not had any issues since wearing these shoes. I wear them daily for work and no issues. I also bought a pair for my mom that is older and can’t deal with shoes that have thick soles. These shoes do squeak if u drag your feet.

First off, I'll say I really like these shoes in general. I own them in several colors. But if you're thinking of getting the light gray, beware. In the photo, light gray is on left and beige is on right. There is a slight difference, but it was pretty minimal and they didn't look very gray to me at all. Also when I ordered the dark gray like a year ago, they sent me the wrong size, one size too big. (I ordered the correct size, I checked on here. I didn't realize it until I was out of the return window.) But overall I love these shoes.

They don't even look like a pair of shoes, poorley made.  I did put them to see if I could walk with them on.  My heel hurt right away that was the least of the problem.  The difference of width looks rediculous.  Makes me think of clown shoes.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THESE WORTHLES SHOES.
They’re perfect. So comfortable. It’s about 30 degrees outside and my feet are WARM in these shoes. Great for gym use and casual wear. I’m very satisfied and so happy with the price. Love them!
No arch support but I got bands to wear with these.  Toe box is roomy so they are very comfortable…not cushiony but still comfortable.
The sole is very soft and flexible, they have such a wide toe box. These have fully converted me to barefoot shoes. Such a great entry point of you want to dip your toe into barefoot shoes.

I take a size 7 with converse which is what I typically wear as they are flatter and I was a tad skeptical before the purchase as I usually have a hard time finding shoes. I wanted something with more of a running tread and these shoes did not disappoint. I purchased size 7 with the black shoes black tread;  they fit perfectly! These shoes are lightweight, fit comfortably and I’m very happy with this purchase.
It's OK if you like minimum cushion.

I've had these shoes for a couple of weeks now and I LOVE THEM! They're stylish, great quality, comfortable, and really deliver on the roomy toe box. I think they're a great value for the price. I will be buying more styles and colors from this brand.

lightweight, comfy and plenty of space in the toe box area. I bought these for all the standing and walking I do inside my home (daily chores, working from home, baking, etc.) They're lightweight like slippers, but have grip & are more snug on my feet - exactly what I was looking for. I typically wear a 8.5 in tennis shoes - and since 1/2 sizes aren't available, I sized up. The 9 has more than enough room at the end of my toe, just enough without being too big. I truly need a 8.5 in these, and wish they came in half sizes! I may order an 8 next time around and see how those work. I'm already eyeing the yellow pair!

These are a well-made, true barefoot shoe. The size guide is spot on and I love that it includes foot dimensions. This is my first time ordering shoes for myself on Amazon and they fit perfectly. They are wide enough for my extra wide feet and are very comfortable. The sole is flexible and it's zero drop, as you can see in the photo. They feel sturdy and good quality, though not as high quality as my Lems. I will probably order more colors over time because honestly you just can't beat the price. I can tell that this is a brand I will be returning to again and again.

评论概述: Comfort the minute I put on
评论详情: Fit perfect .Well made. My feet say Thank You. Will order more.

评论概述: Good for wide feet, have a different feel to them
评论详情: I just tried them on today and used them inside the house.  They are comfortable, but the feel is different.I think most people would get used to that quickly.  There is plenty of room in the toe area, so great for wide feet or for somewhat thicker socks.  I bought the same type of "barefoot" shoe from another brand on Amazon that seems about the same--a little more comfortable and less expensive.  So, I'm going to keep those instead.  However, this is still a good shoe.

I have bunions and these wide toe box minimalist tennis shoes are perfect. They are so comfortable I sometimes forget I have them on. I even walk my dog while wearing them. The big test is the fact that I am an elementary teacher and on my feet all day. They are perfect. I have grey, tan, navy, and red. I’ve been wearing them for over a year and have no complaints.
Very convenient, high quality and beautiful! And fast delivery.
Had neuroma.  Wide toe area plenty of room for my toes to move.

评论概述: Love! And look better than I thought
评论详情: I love them so far! So comfortable! First time in barefoot style shoes. I tried some other barefoot style shoes in store and the Hey Dudes but I felt so funny with how they looked. I was worried I wouldn't get over the "looks" due to being conditioned to wearing narrow tennis shoes. I love this style and don't feel as goofy as I thought I would. I will definitely get more pairs to go with more outfits and to switch things up. They feel durable, comfy, and roomy.

I've been wanting to go from being barefoot or in socks for most of the day to wearing a tie-up shoe. (A foot Dr recommended this to me). I'll be honest I'm really not crazy about the toe shape (it reminds me of Birkenstocks, the "famous" hippie shoe...ugh). But they seem to fit ok and they were economical, so I'll just wear them in the house.
I love these shoes!!!

The shows really feel like you’re walking barefoot! They insoles are great and provides a little cushions between the ground and the feet. I did use water resistance spray which helps keep them dry during the Washington rainy season :) I ordered a size up the first time and there is a lot of room so the next pair I ordered, I went down a size(stay tune)
These are super comfortable. Bought my second pair because I love how comfy they are. These are like walking around with bare feet.

A lot of massage therapists like to work barefoot, but not everyone wants to see your feet out so barefoot shoes are the way to go. Or Crocs, but not for me. I love these and while I intended them to be massage shoes, I just wear them everywhere now. Theme parks and all. The sole has good grip and the toe box is wide enough for me.  Not many people mention not everyone benefits from barefoot shoes and it can potentially exacerbate existing health issues.  Also I'm a guy, but this exact same shoe in men's was like $10 more expensive, at least at the time of my purchase. I see you Whitin.
Better than I expect! Super comfortable! True to size especially if you like a wide toe box.

Really comfortable with wide toe box.  I can’t wear for several days in a row, without having foot pain. I do have plantar fasciitis and trying to stretch muscle so I can wear longer in future.  Better looking than some shoes I’ve seen.  I’m not a fan of the barefoot look.  Found real helpful to slip on for trip to bathroom at night, or in evening when you are relaxing in front of TV.  Works better than slippers because easier to slid foot into.

评论概述: The most comfortable barefoot shoe I've tried
评论详情: I've tried numerous barefoot shoes and all of them are uncomfortable or cause pain of some sort. I had given up on them, until a friend was raving about their Whitin's. I caved, and am so glad I did. They're super comfortable, lightweight, easily slide on and off, and I can do all the activities in them (errands, home chores, gardening, hiking, etc.) Worth it!

Whitin shoes are an amazing, affordable, beginner barefoot shoe brand. They're comfortable, and my toes are able to wiggle around in the toe box wonderfully. The soles are thin enough for my feet to feel the ground, but even after a year of use, they're still holding up beautifully. They are also really grippy on hard floor surfaces. Overall a great, affordable product
Unfortunately I didn’t get these retuned in time. The quality is just not there. They seem to run small.

I wish I hadn't waited so long to buy these! They are so comfortable. I was hesitant because of all my body ailments (bad ankles, bad knees, low back pain, the list goes on) but after wearing them for a few days I am not having any pain or issues. These are the most comfortable shoes I've had in a long time. If you are on the fence about these let this be your sign to just buy them!!!

I like the idea of a big toe box, so was excited when i saw these. They seem well-made, but were too small (i normally wear a 10 1/2, and ordered size 11 to be safe). They were too small, I wish they had fit.
I have several pairs in different colors. They are so comfortable and the fly knit is so forgiving. Good sole  makes it slip resistant and durable for multiple surfaces.

评论概述: If you’re prone to ingrowns, these are for you!
评论详情: I love walking around barefoot. I would genuinely traverse the whole world barefoot if it was safe and socially acceptable to do so. These shoes allow me to feel like I’m walking around barefoot and i love them!!! The toe box space is perfect too. I’m prone to ingrown nails and I have sensory issues when my toes are pressed together so I truly will probably never wear another type of shoe again. Very happy customer!! Will update if anything changes, as I’m going to wear them all week!!😁😁😁

评论概述: Most comfortable shoe I have ever owned
评论详情: These shoes are amazing. I have problems with my feet(bunions, overlapping toes). These shoes are a perfect fit, true to my usual size, very lightweight, plenty of room in the toe area and are not tight anywhere. So comfortable; almost as nice as walking barefoot! I plan on ordering a couple more pair. I highly recommend this product

评论概述: Nice wide toe box. Good all-day shoe
评论详情: These shoes do bridge barefoot  shoes and walking shoes.  They offer more tread and sturdiness than barefoot shoes, but the trade off is that they are not as light or comfortable.  With winter coming and wet ground an issue, I think these shoes will fit the bill.The fit is only fair-tight in some places but too large at the heel.  The toe box is nice and wide, however, and I am able to walk outside in them all day without problens.
They take a little getting used to but are comfortable. I don't recommend going for a 3 mile walk in them until you are used to wearing barefoot type shoes.

评论概述: Great for the gym and walking
评论详情: Super comfy and cute! Perfect for walking the dog and going to the gym
I really like this name brand if shoes.  They are so comfortable.  Have ordered another pair in a different color.

I love these shoes!! Why did I wait so long to order them? I do not like to wear shoes, normally they come off as soon as I walk through the door, but these stay on my feet! Size was right on. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever had on my feet!
Love em. Get em! Great for wide feet

The shoes look good on, however they are badly made. As you can tell in the video, the shoes are falling apart. The glue they used is very obvious and did not seal at all in certain places. They feel and look cheap, definitely overpaying for them.

评论概述: Too grippy for indoor tai chi
评论详情: The shoes fit and look great but the sole really grabs the floor, very hard on the knees. I’ll keep these for situations where traction is important.
Absolutely love.Love them my feet absolutely love them

I have been having pain with my left Achilles tendon for the past few weeks. I became interested in grounded shoes as a possible solution, and the more I read about them, the more I became convinced that they would solve the tendon problem. These shoes were comfortable from the get-go and I do not have any pain at all while wearing them. They are very reasonably priced and the sizing is perfect. I ordered another pair and have let go of my other footwear. So glad I tried them!

I love these open toe box shoes! I have not had plantara fasciitis pain since I started wearing this shoe. I have washed them several times, with no signs of breakdown or loss of integrity. I work in grocery stores and have found these to be completely non-slip. I will definitely be buying more.
I have knee and hip pain and took a leap of faith with these shoes. And they are amazing this is actually my second pair (I wanted more colors).
Strong
I love these shoes, perfect fit, nice color, supportive stylish.
Very comfy
I love these shoes are kind to my toes. They’re kind to my feet and they feel great with or without socks. I have multiple pairs.

评论概述: Great affordable option for minimalist everyday shoes
评论详情: This is my first pair of Whitins, and likely won't be my last. My old xero shoes finally wore out and the budget is a bit tight, so I took a chance on these ones. They run true to size with a very roomy toe box and just enough sole thickness to be comfortable walking on pavement without losing too much ground feel and flexibility. I would say the feel is actually very comparable to the xeros I was wearing, just a smidge thicker sole. I've been wearing barefoot shoes for around 6 or 7 years now and these are a great affordable option with a lot of different styles available from this brand. They're holding up great with around 2 months of walking (mostly on paved paths) 1-3 miles almost daily. I use them as my everyday shoes, not just for walking, and there is enough stretch in the upper that I can pull them on without tying the laces each time. 10/10 so far.
These shoes were perfect for walking around for long periods of time while on vacation. Generous room in the toe box and just enough support in the heel.

评论概述: Not Wide for a size listed as Wide
评论详情: I ordered these in a Wide. However they are not wide enough. They also are cheaply made (China) and the heel is not narrow enough for a woman’s foot. The heel is loose when walking. There is also visible glue where the material and soles meet.
The white shoe was very tight compared to the black shoe I bought in the same size.
Love these shoes. They don’t hurt my feet! In my world that’s a very high bar. Bought three pair.
I actually had to send these back :( I needed a 1/2 size which isn’t offered. I will search for something similar because these are so cute. Love the wide toe. They look great with jeans.
